publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2380 Alex Neil on behalf of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee: Inquiry into the Scottish Higher Education Funding Council Reviews of Teaching and Research Fundingâ€”That the Parliament welcomes the 12th Report 2001 of the Enterprise and Lifelong Learning Committee on the inquiry into the Scottish Higher Education Funding Council reviews of teaching and research funding (SP Paper 423).
